raw: Apple Launches New Cheap iPhone to Boost Sales Ahead of 5G Model .

raw: ( Bloomberg ) -- Apple Inc. unveiled the new iPhone SE , its first low - cost smartphone in four years , seeking to boost sales while consumers wait for the launch of new high - end models with 5 G later this year .
